Trainee trail and New Kingdom event

1. New event: Devils befall

Optimization:
1. Garrison troops share the defense buff when defending in alliance territory and neutral buildings.
2. Materials needed to forge economy equipment has been decreased.
3. Invitation rewards
4. Ranking and allocated rewards during Throne war and Cross-server throne war 
5. Game experience optimized and fixed what needs to be fixed.

1. Added Kingdom special effects;
2. Optimize the Devil Advent event and increase the world ranking game
3. Optimize hero gameplay and polar desert

What’s New:
-Kingdom Ceremony event is upcoming to celebrate 5m download of our game!
-New plaque-Angel’s Wings
-The New Kingdom optimized; new Castle “Floating Castle” added
-Add entering interface of Polar Desert; Experience Bottle icon optimized
Optimization:
-Item classification optimized
-Worker management interface optimized
-Artifact related:
1. Protection icon and a countdown of the Artifact will be displayed in the protection period.
2. The Artifact Skill “Blight Flame” can only be used once to one player each day.
-Tax: if the Wishing Stage is less than a day after the throne war, the tax will be levied as a full day.
-The reporting interface will be added to Players’ info.
-Alliance Tech interface optimized
-Gift Code added in Setting interface

What’s new:
Out-city tiles overview
Preset group in Polar Desert
Detailed record of alliance mates being removed out

Talent and skill interface
